FuncDef:
The pppoe-motm command configures clock synchronization information for PPPoE users carried in MOTM tags of PADM packet.
The undo pppoe-motm command is used to cancel the configuration.
By default, PADM packets do not contain MOTM tags.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the clock synchronization information for PPPoE users carried in MOTM tags of PADM packets.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
MOTM is a tag in a PADM packet. MOTM tag contains clock information provided by a clock server for end users. After a PPPoE session becomes active, ACs send PADM packets to end users. Terminals synchronize clock information based on information carried in MOTM tags (IP address of the NTP clock server).
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
